title: Dibri
content:
DIBRI

Dibri was a man from the tribe of Dan. He was the father of a woman named Shelomith. Shelomith married a man from Egypt. Shelomith and the Egyptian man had a son together. This son committed a serious sin by speaking against God's name. As punishment, the son was stoned to death while the Israelites were in the wilderness (Leviticus 24:10â€“11).
